events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle and filed a claim to start the process.
Based on the description of collision and car damage, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident for further handling.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer through the entire resolution process.
Confirmation of claim receipt was communicated to the customer, with details about the upcoming steps.
The customer was requested to provide the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and driver’s license for claim verification.
All required documents including police report and photographs were submitted promptly by the customer.
The claims team began investigation to assess the damages and validate the circumstances of the vehicle collision.
Investigation concluded with verification of damage extent and confirmation of liability based on evidence collected.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on repair estimates and policy coverage details.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the clarity and fairness of the settlement proposal and the handling of their case.
The claim was officially approved by management following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Payment was successfully processed and issued to the customer’s bank account to cover repair costs.
The claim was closed as all required steps were completed and the customer’s issue was fully resolved.
The closed claim was archived in the system to maintain records of the auto accident and resolution for future reference.
